description: The move comes as policemen are charged over an assault on a black man which shocked the nation.
title: France to rewrite police security bill after huge protests
title_page: France to rewrite police security bill after huge protests - BBC News
maintext: At the weekend, prosecutors said the officers had admitted that their violence against Mr Zecler was unjustified but said they acted out of panic after he resisted them in the cramped surroundings of the studio entrance.
